\setlength{\parskip}{\smallskipamount}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{setspace}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\section{Simulation Parameters}

\subsection{Constants}

Pre-defined constats used in Langmuir Model is listed below. 

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|}
\hline 
Variable Name & Value & Unit & Description\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
$E\_CHARGE$ & $1.602\times10^{-19}$ & $C$ & Elementary Charge\tabularnewline
\hline 
$KB$ & $1.38064852\times10^{-23}$ & $m^{2}kgs^{-2}K^{-1}$ or $J/K$ & Boltzmann Constant\tabularnewline
\hline 
$AMU$ & $1.661\times10^{-27}$ & $kg$ & Atomic Mass Unit\tabularnewline
\hline 
$E\_Mass$  & $9.109\times10^{-31}$ & $kg$ & Electron Mass\tabularnewline
\hline 
$EPS0$ & $8.854\times10^{-12}$ & $m^{2}kgs^{-2}K^{-1}$ or $F/m$ & Vacuum Permittivity\tabularnewline
\hline 
$MU0$ & $1.257\times10^{-6}$ & $H/m$ & Vacuum Permeability\tabularnewline
\hline 
$TORR2PA$  & $133.3$ & $Pa/Torr$ & From Torr to Pa\tabularnewline
\hline 
$J2EV$ & $6.24210^{18}$ & $eV/J$ & From J to eV\tabularnewline
\hline 
$EV2J$ & $1.602\times10^{-19}$ & $J/eV$ & From eV to J\tabularnewline
\hline 
$K2EV$ & $11600.0$ & $eV/K$ & From K to eV\tabularnewline
\hline 
$EV2K$ & $1/11600.0$ & $K/eV$ & From eV to K\tabularnewline
\hline 
$K2J$ & $KB$ & $J/K$ & From K to J\tabularnewline
\hline 
$J2K$ & $1/KB$ & $K/J$ & From J to K\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}

\subsection{Dimensionless Parameters and Naming Rules}

Conductivity

aaa:

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline 
Variable Name & Type & Unit & Size & Dimensionless & Description\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
$nx$ & int &  &  &  & Number of Grids in X Axis\tabularnewline
\hline 
$nz$ & int &  &  &  & Number of Grids in Z Axis\tabularnewline
\hline 
$eps[]$ & Real & Dimensionless & $nx\times nz$ & $\frac{real\;value}{EPS0}$ & Relative Dieletric Constant\tabularnewline
\hline 
$press$ & Real & $Torr$ & 1 &  & Pressure\tabularnewline
\hline 
$I\_coil$ & Real & $A$ & 1 &  & Current\tabularnewline
\hline 
$ $ & Species &  & 1 &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
$positiveIon[]$ & Array of Species &  & Num of Positive Ions &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
$negativeIon[]$ & Array of Species &  & Num of Negative Ions &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
$neutral[]$ & Array of Species &  & Num of Neutral Species &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
$nx$ & int &  &  &  & Number of Grids in X Axis\tabularnewline
\hline 
$nz$ & int &  &  &  & Number of Grids in Z Axis\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_type$ & string & Dimensionless & $1$ &  & $'EON'$, $'ION'$ or $'NEUT'$\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_mass$ & Real & Dimensionless & $1$ & $\frac{real\;value}{AMU}$ & Mass in AMU\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_charge$ & int & Dimensionless & $1$ & $\frac{real\;value}{E\_CHARGE}$ & Charge in Elementary Charge\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_density[]$ & RealArray1D & $m^{-3}$ & $nx\times nz$ & $\frac{m\_density}{10^{10}}$(optional) & Species Desnity\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_temperature[]$ & RealArray1D & $eV$ & $nx\times nz$ &  & Species Temperature\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_fluxx[]$ & RealArray1D & $m^{-2}s^{-1}$ & $nx\times nz$ &  & Species Flux in X Axis\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_fluxz[]$ & RealArray1D & $m^{-2}s^{-1}$ & $nx\times nz$ &  & Species Flux in Z Axis\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_divergence[]$ & RealArray1D & $m^{-3}s^{-1}$ & $nx\times nz$ &  & Flux Term\tabularnewline
\hline 
$m\_source[]$ & RealArray1D & $m^{-3}s^{-1}$ & $nx\times nz$ &  & Source Term\tabularnewline
\hline 
 &  &  &  &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}
\end{document}
